joy-composite.name: Temp - Check if Category has score

joy-join.joy-entity: Temp - Check if Category has score

joy-entities.joy-customquery: select max(DIM_TIME.TIM_CALENDAR_DATE) AS rundate, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_NAME, avg(FRS_KPI_SCORE) AS SCORE, CAT_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_DQAXIS, DIM_TIME, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.DQX_FK = DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TIM_FK = DIM_TIME.TIM_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK GROUP BY dqx_name, tim_calendar_date, CAT_FK ORDER BY CAT_FK, tim_calendar_date

select DISTINCT dim_context.con_description, dim_context.con_pk, CAT_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_CONTEXT, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.con_fk = DIM_CONTEXT.con_Pk

select DISTINCT DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_sourcename, DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_connection,DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_pk, CAT_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_DATASOURCE, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK And FACT_GOVERNANCE.dso_fk = DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_pk
select distinct CAT_PK, CAT_NAME from FACT_GOVERNANCE, DIM_TERM, DIM_CATEGORY Where TRM_FK > 0 And FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK And DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_PK = DIM_TERM.CAT_FK Order by CAT_NAME

SELECT AVG (FRS_KPI_SCORE) AS SCORE, AVG (FRS_COST) AS COST, DQX_NAME, TRM_NAME, TRM_FK, DQX_CODE, CAT_FK FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK) B, DIM_DQAXIS, DIM_TERM WHERE TRM_FK > 0 AND DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_PK = B.DQX_FK AND B.TRM_FK = DIM_TERM.TRM_PK GROUP BY DQX_NAME, TRM_NAME, TRM_FK, DQX_CODE, CAT_FK ORDER BY TRM_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT DIM_GLOSSARY.GLO_PK, DIM_GLOSSARY.GLO_NAME, DIM_GLOSSARY.GLO_DESCRIPTION, DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_PK FROM DIM_CATEGORY, DIM_TERM, DIM_GLOSSARY WHERE DIM_CATEGORY.CAT_PK = DIM_TERM.CAT_FK AND DIM_TERM.GLO_FK = DIM_GLOSSARY.GLO_PK

SELECT DISTINCT parent.CAT_PK, parent.CAT_NAME, parent.CAT_ID, parent.CAT_PARENT_ID, parent.CAT_DATETIME_LOAD, parent.CAT_DESCRIPTION, parent.CAT_FULLPATH, REF.CAT_PK AS CAT_FILTERING FROM DIM_CATEGORY REF, DIM_CATEGORY parent LEFT JOIN (select FACT_GOVERNANCE.*, DIM_TERM.CAT_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And DIM_TERM.TRM_PK = FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK) B ON B.CAT_FK = parent.CAT_PK WHERE PARENT.CAT_ID = REF.CAT_PARENT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT enfant.CAT_PK, enfant.CAT_NAME, enfant.CAT_ID, enfant.CAT_PARENT_ID, enfant.CAT_DATETIME_LOAD, enfant.CAT_DESCRIPTION, enfant.CAT_FULLPATH, REF.CAT_PK AS CAT_FILTERING FROM DIM_CATEGORY REF, (select FACT_GOVERNANCE.*, DIM_TERM.CAT_FK from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A, DIM_TERM Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK And DIM_TERM.TRM_PK = FACT_GOVERNANCE.TRM_FK) B LEFT JOIN DIM_CATEGORY enfant ON B.CAT_FK = enfant.CAT_PK WHERE enfant.CAT_PARENT_ID = REF.CAT_ID
